Related repos

  • open source in-memory key/value datastore, forked from Redis, supports many data structures and plugins
  • disk-based key-value store in Zig inspired by Bitcask
  • a fast, simple key-value cache
  • Draws graph of Python data structures
  • RocksDB — embeddable key-value store library for persistent data storage
  • Lightweight Python server for Bitcoin and Lightning wallets
  • L2/L3 orderbook data structure in C for Python
  • Python backend with auto-generated APIs and multi-tenancy
  • Python library for AI memory management
